attributes.action: Allow fitness classes to go ahead in tier 3
attributes.additional_details: For the government to review fitness classes to be allowed in tier 3, gyms are great that they have been opened but not everyone gets the benefit mentally from going to the gym as they do in a fitness class!
attributes.background: To review its decision on fitness classes in tier 3 and allow them to go ahead

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555618
